website_summaries.verdict: A quality choice in a bath mat that is soft and absorbent.
pros: Soft, luxurious feel, nice size, and attractive appearance
Consumers also feel it absorbs water well
cons: While absorbent, some feel it doesn't dry efficiently
Others report it can be slippery despite its nonslip design

customer_reviews.title: Broken Back!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product and is not at all slip resistant! After purchasing this bath mat, I placed it on my bathroom floor in front of my bath tub. Two weeks ago as I was getting out of the shower, I stepped on this bath mat as it slid across my floor until I fell hard on the floor. I had never hurt my back so badly in my entire life! I couldn’t walk or even more! Even the slightest movement caused me excruciating pain! I ended up going to the emergency room and my doctor! Do NOT buy this product! It is dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different use :)
customer_reviews.text: Makes a perfect cushy addition to a dog kennel! Way cheaper than kennel pads. Placed under kennel bed for more comfort! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Never dries, very slippery, hazardous
customer_reviews.text: Was misled by the overwhelming positive reviews. Mat was consistently wet underneath, which by itself isn't that big of a deal. What was a big deal was how slick the mat against the tile floor became. Many times over the course of the first week the mat tried to slip out from under my foot and I had to catch myself on the sink. Extremely hazardous. Returned it and bought a couple of bath mat towels you would use at a hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you want a camel mat!
customer_reviews.text: The mat never drys out like other one star reviewers have said. It's been a week with no use at all and is still very damp. It holds water so well so I'm calling it a camel mat. Also I'm throwing it away and buying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great mats but not always the same feel
customer_reviews.text: These mats are amazing, I bought 10 of them. Overall I like them and they do a good job absorbing water and they are very soft too. I'm giving them only 3 stars because 4 out of the 10 mats I bought feel different when i step on them, they have less foam. I was planning to buy more but the last 4 made me wait a bit to see how they turn out. long story short, they are good mats but they are not consistent in they way they feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great mats, have a slight smell
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. Machine washable, so should be easy to clean. Haven’t washed them yet though so I can’t speak on how they hold up. I gave 4 stars overall because although they look and feel great, there is a slight smell to them when you take them out of the package. This smell took over my small bathroom. I just sprayed my mats with some febreeze and it went away. Smell only later a few hours. I can definitely get past the smell though because they are wonderful in all other way!
customer_reviews.author: Raegan Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I've had this mat for awhile now and love it. It dries out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the people who say this doesn't dry out. I've had this mat for awhile now and love it. It dries out very quickly, stays in place and is comfy on the feet. It dries out faster than your typical bath mat and springs back into action right away - never any feet imprints. It always looks nice, always feels nice. I bought the grey but I may be buying a green one soon so both bathrooms have one. Everyone in the house wants my shower -lol. I was NOT paid or offered any deal for my review and I am brutally honest when writing one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Bummed...
customer_reviews.text: The absorbency and comfort of these rugs are not an issue-- it's what you would hope for from a bath mat like this. However, the appearance is really nothing special. They are a dull grey color and honestly look like they were faded right out of the box. They serve their purpose but I must admit I am disappointed with their appearance-- I don't want to spend money on something new when it already looks like it has had months of use right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my RV and they are perfect for the bathroom and kitchen area.
customer_reviews.author: HBearsfan37

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but color is a little lighter than we expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's very well made and works much better than the old bath towel we were using as a mat for the dub. Dries very quickly. It's a little large to try to hang over the side of the tub, but we will make do. Color was lighter than I expected. It is a little lighter than we were looking for. All of our towels, washcloths, rugs, and toilet seat cover are darker. No one sees this except when it is on the floor, so when we are not using it, the mat is out of site.
customer_reviews.author: hockeypuck

customer_reviews.title: Very Absorbent, However hit holds water
customer_reviews.text: Loved these mats. Love the comfort of stepping out on them, very soft, easy to clean and they really soak up water. The problem is they hold the water. Ruined my new hardwood floors. I would actually take up until I thought they were dry, but somehow they were still damp. Very sad that this happed. I really loved these rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Nice mats for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seem pretty well made. Not super thick, so if you are looking for something very absorbent, this probably isnt the mat for you. It does have some cushion, though. I use one in a bathroom without a shower and another as a "landing" pad for my small, geriatric dog when he jumps down from his slightly elevated bed onto the tile. I have washed them already and they wash well. The price for 2 mats is great.
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyedellen

customer_reviews.title: These bath mats feel good under your feet and are absorbent and act as ...
customer_reviews.text: These bath mats feel good under your feet and are absorbent and act as a bath mat should except for the fact that they don't stay in one place. The rubber backing on the back isn't sticky enough and the mat moves around a lot. I asked the seller it they made this in a larger size so I didn't have to buy 2 of them because I have a large bathroom and they don't so I bought two but it seems like I'm always straightening them. Other than that it's not a bad product
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product. You get your bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great! I love them. The only thing I wish was different was the color. I purchased the sage green mats. The mats look a different color online due to the screen resolution. When I received the product I was not necessarily happy with the item color. The item is closer to a light brown than a green
customer_reviews.author: Shopper134

customer_reviews.title: Affordable luxury
customer_reviews.text: Like: how soft and plush it feels, and it's so affordable that I can replace them when they start to get worn (after a year or so) and it's no big deal. Dislike: they do hold water for a while and so I sometimes step on them an hour or two after my wife has showered and their cold and damp.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonsumer

customer_reviews.title: Very disgusted and
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail as "new" opened the plastic and it was covered in animal fur, smelled used and moldy and had snags. Returned immediately. Very disgusted and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amy Butler

customer_reviews.title: Not pretty at all, but functional
customer_reviews.text: Serviceable, but not great. The pad is kind of thin, and the green is kind of washed-out and dingy. Technically, sure, it's "sage green" but not a very pretty shade of sage green IMHO. Still, it's memory foam, and it stays in place, which is nice. I changed my review because the plastic backing actually traps moisture under the mat, and it takes forever to dry, and is also bulky and ugly when you hang it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The grey is lighter than it appeared online but still very nice. Comfortable rugs that do not slip but they are a little thin. All in all, they are definitely worth the price and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Soft landing
customer_reviews.text: Got these because I needed a soft mat to step out of the shower on. These work perfectly and cushion my sore feet. They seem not to be extremely absorbent but comfort is the most important thing to me. They are attractive and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Fonda

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry well. Slips.
customer_reviews.text: Even after sitting all day, this mat accumulates water beneath it and it doesn't seem to dry. I've slipped on the mat multiple times after repositioning it trying to possibly get more 'ventilation'. I don't feel safe with this mat and it does not meet its description.
customer_reviews.author: AJ HILL

customer_reviews.title: The color description when I ordered them was Sage Green like the larger mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 bath mats along with a larger one. The color description when I ordered them was Sage Green like the larger mat, but when I saw them, I realized that they were much lighter in color than the first mat. I was disappointed, but since they are not being used in the same area of the bathroom, I am not returning them.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie venable

customer_reviews.title: Great bath mats
customer_reviews.text: I bought the "chocolate" colored bath mats, and the color depiction online is accurate. There's not much to say about these, other than they're soft and feel good on my feet, they don't scoot around, they're able to absorb the water, and I am happy with my purchase. I bought two sets (4 mats) for my two bathrooms. They look good and not cheap. I only wish they were bigger, because I have an open shower (not my design- I'm renting; it's probably a 4x3' shower), and it does not cover the entire splash area outside of the shower despite my best efforts to move the shower head away from the walk-in area.
customer_reviews.author: Autonomous J.E.N.

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs like a sponge
customer_reviews.text: Holds water like a sponge. You have to throw it in the dryer for 30 minutes after one person showers before you can use it again. It is soft, but it’s not the same chocolate color as the other chocolate mats and towels, this one is more of a very dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Bath mats
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath mats! They are so soft and absorbent. They stay in place on the floor and do not slip/move. They dry quickly for the next use. Also, the sage green color is the perfect shade of green I was looking for. I would recommend these to everyone. Plus there are two in the pack for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat is great and I am considering buying another one for in front of the sink as well as the one next to the tub.. The foam makes it so comfortable to step out onto from the shower and it absorbs and wicks moisture away from your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Taylor-White

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my purpose, which was to place it at the foot of our bed on top of the regular carpet. Since it's not going to be used in the bathroom, I was not concerned about it becoming wet and slippery as some reviewers had noted. Also, the sage green is such a pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Older_but_Wiser

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 for husband's bathroom because I could control the configuration. They are very nice quality for the price. Haven't laundered so I can't speak for the durability.
customer_reviews.author: KKYR2013

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This Friday came on time loving this I am very comfortable the memory Pat is very thick not too thin very comfortable to my feet it doesn't slip loving the mat
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the sage green, got chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a pretty good set of mats so there is your one star, but given it’s not what I ordered...I am not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: The rubber underside becomes slippery on my tile floors when wet. I came really close to taking a bad fall because of this but was able to catch myself. I wish I could give this 5 stars for everything else. The build quality is very decent for the price, but the slipperiness when wet defeats the purpose of having a bath mat. This bath mat is extremely dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: cearp

customer_reviews.title: fall hazard
customer_reviews.text: Fall hazard..I wanted to use them a while before reviewing. I'm glad I did. They look neat but the absorbency is horrible. They slip and slide all over the floor
customer_reviews.author: Jzariah

customer_reviews.title: Just ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived, it smelled, so bad, like chemicals. I had to wash it really well to get the smell out. The thickness of the mat was thin compared to previous ones I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lew

customer_reviews.title: My own cloud
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice product at a great price. Was sick of my old mats and these mats are perfect replacements. Pretty soft for the price I paid for them and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: shruti agrawal

customer_reviews.title: There are better
customer_reviews.text: They are not as thick as expected, or perhaps the foam is just too soft so you sink in quickly, or maybe it's just because there are so many seams in it so you have to place your feet just right between the lines to get the full effect. I don't know exactly what it is, but I've felt better foam mats under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Teague D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but small.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the quality, but frankly, even though I laid out the measurement before I purchased, once you lay it down it appears to be very small. In fact, you can get much larger ones for the same price, (or less.) I probably would not buy this again, but I needed this specific color. It's 'ok'.
customer_reviews.author: B. TalleyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat in a week.
customer_reviews.text: This rug is soft to the touch, like velour. However, the rug went flat in a matter of four days. I bought a different mat from Costco at the same time and that one is still like brand new. This gray rug is not “large” it’s more medium. It also holds a lot of static and makes my hair cling. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing, definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these rugs! They are so soft, and have retained their plush feel. They dry quickly, about 30 minutes. I am happy to say that they have no smell chemical, or otherwise. I, also, live in a VERY humid area. Mold is a huge problem here, and I haven't had a single issue with these. I've owned these rugs for several months, now. I'm certain that I would have discovered an issue, had there been one!
customer_reviews.author: Jesi

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Basic set of memory foam mats. They are not super thick which makes cleaning a bit easier. A little bulky for the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: Really soft and great value
customer_reviews.text: So glad these came in pairs as now I and my dog can each have our own mat in the van. She loves it and I don't care that she drools all over it either!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Soft matts
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft these are to step on it the bathroom. I use them both under a larger decorative bath matt that matches my bathroom better. They don't move around at all and for the price I will buy again when I need more
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Bells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mat Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice memory foam bath mat at a fraction of Dept Store price. Definetly will look for this seller again when needed. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought a bunch of these. Not for my bathroom but to lay in key areas on my laminate floor. My elder dog (16) was having a hard time getting around on the laminate. She would keep slipping because of her weak hind legs. These mats were just the right thing. Non slip and nice and soft for her to lay on. Very easy on my elder gal. No more slipping.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft But A Bit Thin
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but thin. It would have been nice if they were a bit thicker. They are definitely nonslip and stay in place well. It's also nice that it comes with 2 rugs. I also like that the water absorbs really well. If you found my review helpful - please click helpful found below my review and if you have questions I did not answer feel free to leave a comment or go to my profile and email me. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda G.

customer_reviews.title: They NEED non skid Added to Them
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good quality but they move around easily and a lot; not recommended for kids, elderly or pets who would be likely injured not expecting it to move like they do.
customer_reviews.author: L Files

customer_reviews.title: Secure, soft, and machine washable made this the perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 8 for a special needs child to have a soft place to play that could easily be tossed into the washer if there were any accidents. Mats stay put for safety, are soft, absorbent, and machine washable. Satisfied with purchase and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Leach

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: amazing at this price! Im about to order another set for the upstairs bathroom! I discovered these at my brother's house and my SIL told me she got them on amazon.com I am amazed at the quality they feel so luxurious! I have only had them a couple of weeks so cant speak on longevity but they seem to be made pretty well. Cant wait to get another set for our guest bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was such an awesome purchase. I was afraid the color would come ...
customer_reviews.text: This was such an awesome purchase. I was afraid the color would come in different than the picture but what is shown is pretty much what came in. It's made very nicely, a great size for my bathroom and very soft. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: These mats are really good value
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath mats I got two for the price that would normally pay for one They're very soft They're very attractive and I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: A. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: We're happy walking in the bathroom now..
customer_reviews.text: The bath mats are exactly the color as shown on Amazon by the seller thus matching my previous purchase of a bamboo mat in dark brown perfectly. I pre-measured where they were going so the fit is as expected. They are true to size (17 x 24). These bathmats are as cushy as the mats I felt in person in stores that were twice the price. I haven't had any problems with moisture not evaporating, they perform as any other bath mat I've owned. Over all I would recommend the purchase of these mats from this seller to friends and family. I paid full price for this purchase and was not compensated in any way for my review.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great bath mat - looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great bath mat - looks good, absorbent, rubbery backing keeps it in place, nice size, and it's thick, soft, and comfortable. Great price and seems well constructed. I liked it enough to immediately buy a second one to put in front of my sink! It does seem to collect and show lint and whatever, but mine is dark brown so that is to be expected, and might be less of a problem with a lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, I bought other brand and returned. Instead I bought this twice to replace the less quality brand. I have washed and dried them in my washer and dryer, they held up really well. Though I have not used it for shower yet, not sure about the absorbency performance yet, otherwise highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice mats but Mats are cut Short
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice mat but no a one of them I bought at the time is 32" long. They are not even 30" long. Foreign made. Its a mat but not what I wanted as far as size. Not worth sending back. Making due with the dumb things anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Macabee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bath mats
customer_reviews.text: Looks and functions just like the mats I purchased from bed bath and beyond for over twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy E.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me over time.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I missed this, but the mat is designed to not absorb water at all...it beads up. But over time it does start to absorb water...and then it becomes a gross sponge because it does not let the water go
customer_reviews.author: Chaim PB White

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold up after washing. Super comfy. It's not as absorbent as others in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and great price. You’ll love the feel of this with your bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Susy

customer_reviews.title: Soft for your feet
customer_reviews.text: They are most comfortable mats to step on, it's of good quality and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin David

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: It was great for the first few months, but fell apart within a year. The rubber bottom loosens from the top padding within the first few washes making it more susceptible to ripping/tearing. It feel really comfortable & the color is really nice. I was just expecting it to last longer. Mine has fallen apart & I'm writing this with a couple of hotel-style towel mats sitting in my Amazon cart. Hopefully they will hold up to cleaning in my apartment building's washer/dryer.
customer_reviews.author: C T

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving! Pass
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Returing. Dont waste ur money. It is not memory foam. It's nice soft material outside & ruined by likely just cheap piece of thin foam. I got this to help w pain in feet I have on bare floor doing dishes & prevent falling. That didnt even last a minute We instantly go right to the floor & feels as thefe's nothing there!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again if they made bigger sizes/ varity of sizes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the rugs. And the color Yes I was given measurements in the description, but didnt not check. Im not happy with the size of the rugs. But everyting else im pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: ugh the smell!
customer_reviews.text: the smell...what is that smell??? I washed them and they still smell! AND they won't dry! I ran them in my dryer for 3 hours and still they are wet! Also, they are way thinner than I expected. Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are pretty decent. I don't use them right out of the shower so, not much experience on it drying. But they are not very absorbent. The initial step onto the mat feels great. But the one thing that I've noticed is that if you stand on the pad in the same spot for a minute like while brushing your teeth the mat will compress and it will lose all of its cushy-ness. It will feel like you are standing barefoot on your bathroom floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate cold floors
customer_reviews.text: This item is so soft and keeps feet warm when you step out of shower. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Peg V.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these little mats. Perfect size for our small (full) bathroom. So comfy and easy to clean. I just throw them in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft,
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice and soft bath mat and my only complain is that the green is actually a bit more washed out than it appears here in the picture. I was hoping and expecting a bit brighter green but after I received this mat the green was a bit dull. Not a deal breaker, I still kept it and like it, I just wish the color was a bit brighter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, adsorbent, perfect smaller size to fit in a tight bathroom area.
customer_reviews.author: possum

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on Clouds
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure buying this for my boyfriend saved our relationship. JK, we broke up, but we both loved this thing, and I checked when I was back over there and he still uses it - and given how the breakup went, that's saying a lot about the rug. It's nice and soft and doesn't get gross holding in water or anything. It's like stepping on clouds. The color was also nice and vibrant and it was a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: These mats are soft and look good but do not absorb water very well at all
customer_reviews.text: These mats are soft and look good but do not absorb water very well at all. I have four children and by the time the third one is out of the shower the floor is soaking wet under the mat. I do no recommend these mats for a shower that multiple people will be using in a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: Beware of coloring...
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be okay with the two we bought other than the "chocolate color" looking nearly black instead of brown :(.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft,
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and soft and my only complain is that the green is actually a bit more washed out than it appears here in the picture. I was hoping and expecting a bit brighter, solid, green but after I received these they were a bit dull. Not a deal breaker, I still kept them, I just wish the color was a bit brighter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the price. They do slip a little. But otherwise decent quality. The color is nice, but lighter than what shows on my monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McGee

customer_reviews.title: But my husband is happy with it
customer_reviews.text: a bit small and it tends to collect dirt from any room it is in. But my husband is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: the Crossing

customer_reviews.title: Dirty, seafoam green
customer_reviews.text: Not the green as pictured. Dirty, seafoam green. Light, dusty green. Not very cushy compared to other foam mats I have. Could get the same set at Ross but was looking for the specific color. But for the price and fast delivery: sure.
customer_reviews.author: KPerlot

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not very squishy or comfy to stand on. Takes about .5 second to go through it and then it's just a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable. This was a gift for my mum in ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable. This was a gift for my mum in her bathroom and she loves it. She works 12 hr shifts and it’s a nice end to a shower after a long day to stand on something soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: not washable
customer_reviews.text: fell apart in washer got all that stuff in my washer would not recommend this and I bought in red and green and they both did the same thing
customer_reviews.author: Littered

customer_reviews.title: so soft!!!!
customer_reviews.text: these are so soft to the touch. They feel amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable on the feet and soft
customer_reviews.text: These mats are nice in the bathroom. Good for absorbency when stepping out of the shower. I bought two! Tiles are hard on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Thicker and more cushion than some
customer_reviews.text: Nice padding, very comfortable for standing and any absorption of water in the bathroom. I, also, bought a couple for my dog to lay on with a blanket over them in the back of my rig. (Less money than a dog bed and great option for the vehicle)
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Good Small Bath Mat
customer_reviews.text: These are not too thick of a mat. Great product for the price. They arrived darker than appeared on line, a dark charcoal grey. Measure at 17x 24 inches.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyGurl

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I use this by the kitchen sink and it works great, it does move around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Plrh8r

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I actually used these for the front floor mats in my car....I love them...and you can vacuum them and wash them.
customer_reviews.author: THE MOONS

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great product. Soft, absorbant...very comfortable. Don't slide when getting out of the shower!
customer_reviews.author: KSB2012

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time & in good condition. It's soft & cushy but doesn't absorb water very well. It just kind of beads up on the top but I'm thinking that's just bc it's still new. Overall, I think it's a good value & am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for bath. We love the feel on the feet. Very durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Louie E. Martinez II

customer_reviews.title: Plush and big.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. I was dreading getting a mat that was cheap, small and not plush but I was not dissatisfied at all. Would recommend and buy again. The water beaded on the top and I didn't feel that nasty wet squish when I used it after someone. Hope it washes and dried well but haven't done that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nona's Momma

customer_reviews.title: Look and wash up great
customer_reviews.text: Wush they had some sort of a more supportive layer that wouldnt go flat while standing on it. It feels wonderful at first, but in just moments my feet are hurting as bad as if I were standing on the hard floor. Other than that, they are perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery; I don't get why others say they are secure to the ground
customer_reviews.text: I really don't get all of these fantastic reviews for these mats. Mine are incredibly slippery. When I walk out of the shower I've almost killed myself several times. Maybe the brown ones are different than the green? Each time I step on these they go flying....
customer_reviews.author: Greg Weitzner

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend them. Cheers
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd be excited about something as mundane as a bathroom floor mat, but I can truthfully say that I when I step out of my shower sopping wet I am excited to see these cozy mats welcome my feet. The other I put in front of my sink. Does it make me brush my teeth more? Probably not. Does it make me brush my teeth more *barefoot*? Yes. I'd recommend them. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made and they have held up well with washing. I ordered the green which is a lighter sage green. Has a fair amount of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bathmats.
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft bath mats and I really love the color .
customer_reviews.author: LisaS.

customer_reviews.title: Bath mat to stove mat
customer_reviews.text: Yes I'm happy I'm just not using it as a bath mat I'm using it as a mad for cushion for the stove because of conditions with my feet so it's working perfectly as an extra cushion soft cushion as I stand there
customer_reviews.author: jim perkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bathroom mats
customer_reviews.text: Great mats at a great price. Super soft and warming on my tile floor. Absorbs everything and doesn’t stay wet too long.
customer_reviews.author: Gilly

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd purchase. The first set I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase. The first set I used for 2 years. They are still holding up. Ordered 2nd set for when guest come by.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W.

customer_reviews.title: I had hopes of them being thicker but they work fine. The only problem I have with them is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dogs in the kennel. I had hopes of them being thicker but they work fine. The only problem I have with them is that my dogs dig at them and end up folding them up . lol not the rugs fault. Overall a good rug at a good value
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Way exceeded my expect
customer_reviews.text: Way exceeded my expect Not bed one Memory foam bathroom mat
customer_reviews.author: Theo K

customer_reviews.title: Good padding
customer_reviews.text: Soft as you can get! They do slide a bit 🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Plrh8r

customer_reviews.title: Great shower mat
customer_reviews.text: Great shower mat. I dry off before stepping out of the shower, so it doesn't ever get a lot of water. The water that does get on the mat dries quickly. This mat has a great plush feel and is nice to step on out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy But hard to sweep.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the rugs but they are really hard to sweep off. 🤦🏾‍♀️ You have to sweep for about a minute in the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: Shundrica Torrance

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Love the cushioning, color and size! Lightning-fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this mat as a bathroom rug so haven't tried to clean it yet, but it's very soft and cushiony! It's a perfect size and I love the sage color! Great price and it came lightning-fast! Am very happy with!
customer_reviews.author: Desiray

product_meta.title: Magnificent Memory Foam Bath Mat, 2 Pack, 20 x 32 Bathroom Rugs, Non Slip Ultra Absorbent, Grey
product_meta.description:
Size:20" x 32"| Color:GreyCoral Fleece Memory Foam Bath Mats Pack of 2
Bring home this Coral Fleece Memory Foam Bath Mats Pack of 2 and give your feet the right level of warmth followed by a cloud-like feel straight out of the shower area. Each mat measures 20 x 32 Inches, which is enough space for your feet to dry on, and the grey color of it complements well with the surrounding. Also, the pack of 2 allows you to have better use of it as you can utilize more than one mat at a time.

High-Quality Formation
The 100% polyester coral fleece and 35D, 1.2CM, PU memory foam material delivers an experience that you can value for long. The outer border of the mats and Styrene Butadiene Rubber backing with embossing further enhances its quality as it provides strong stitching to keep its formation intact. It carries high absorbency property followed by non-slip backing that assists in keeping the mat dry and stationed without skidding/shifting when it comes in contact with your feet. Multipurpose
The bath mat improves the overall appeal of your bathroom by coordinating nicely with the surrounding as well as with other products like towels etc. Also, you can play around with the mat’s placement as you can place it right out of the shower area, in front of the sink or wherever desired.

Machine Friendly
Cleaning is not a great concern anymore, and you can get done with this task in quick time as these mats are made machine-friendly. Machine wash the mats in cold water using a mild detergent and tumble dry on a low heat setting with great ease. However, hand wash and dry would be ideal. Also, these top quality mats will not fade even after going through multiple wash and dry cycles.

Caution
- Please avoid the use of bleach or chlorine. 
- Make sure to place the mat/s on a dry floor to prevent slipping.
feature_bullets: Includes 2 Pack of Memory Foam Bath Mat

LUXURY & COMFORT - Give your feet a cloud-like feel straight out of the shower while having these soft and comfortable bath mats placed in your bathroom; it comes in a pack of 2 which allows you to utilize one or both of these at a time to keep your toes warm

HIGH-QUALITY FORMATION - The 100% polyester coral fleece and 35D, 1.2CM, PU memory foam material delivers the best of experience that you can value for long; the solid outer border and Styrene Butadiene Rubber backing with embossing further enhances the quality and appeal of the mat

HIGH ABSORBENCY & NON-SLIP BACKING - The high absorbency property followed by non-slip backing keeps the mat dry and stationed without skidding/shifting when it comes in contact with your feet; please ensure that the bath mat is placed on a dry floor to prevent slipping

MULTIPURPOSE -The bath mat improves the overall appeal of your bathroom by coordinating nicely with the surrounding as well as with other products like towel etc.; the placement of the mat is not only limited to the shower area, but you can also place it in front of the sink or elsewhere
